name: Reach the Moon (FrankGameDev)
description:
The concept of this game is to launch your spaceship and reach the moon in less then 10 seconds. Asteroids will fall down, you can shot it with your mouse.

Before starting the launch, you can upgrade ship's engine with tokens earned by destroying asteroids.

Thank you for play!

This is my very first jam and i spent on this game only a full day because of work, be kind :)
